title: AMU Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Assistant Professor Post
description: Aligarh Muslim University (AMU) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Assistant Professor Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Post Graduation, Ph.D, can grab this chance and apply for the AMU Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can apply before the last date of application. If you are looking for mor...
